summary: A vendored implementation of the Typeguard library that adds runtime validation of Python type hints. It supplies decorators, import‑hook instrumentation, configuration objects, memoization, and utilities for checking function arguments, return values, collections, unions, and other typing constructs, along with custom exceptions, suppression mechanisms, and pytest integration.
business_intent: Enable developers to automatically enforce type annotations during execution, helping detect type mismatches early, improve code reliability, support debugging and testing, and provide configurable, pluggable type‑checking behavior within Metaflow applications.
